53.movie_plot: A mute alien with the appearance of a black human is chased by outer-space bounty hunters through the streets of Harlem.

50.movie_name: Adventures of Buckaroo Bonzai Across the 8th Dimension, The (1984)
50.movie_plot: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

59.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)
59.movie_plot: The world is shocked by the appearance of three talking chimpanzees, who arrived mysteriously in a U.S. spacecraft. They become the toast of society, but one man believes them to be a threat to the human race.

54.movie_plot: The story of two men, who met as apprentices in the Peking Opera, and stayed friends for over 50 years.

55.movie_plot: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

64.movie_plot: Robocop saves the day once more. This time the half man/half robot takes on ruthless developers who want to evict some people on "their" land.

58.movie_plot: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

62.movie_plot: A man who works for 'The Party' (an all powerful empire led by a man known only as 'Big Brother') begins to have thoughts of rebellion and love for a fellow member. Together they look to help bring down the party.

51.movie_plot: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

49.movie_plot: A high-school boy is given the chance to write a story for Rolling Stone Magazine about an up-and-coming rock band as he accompanies them on their concert tour.

52.movie_plot: In San Francisco, a group of people discover the human race is being replaced one by one, with clones devoid of emotion.

61.movie_plot: A scientist is nearly assassinated. In order to save him, a submarine is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into his blood stream with a small crew. Problems arise almost as soon as they enter the bloodstream.

60.movie_plot: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

63.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

57.movie_plot: Set at the intersection of the near future and the reimagined past, explore a world in which every human appetite, no matter how noble or depraved, can be indulged without consequence.

56.movie_plot: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

4.movie_plot: When a man goes for virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or does he?

20.movie_plot: In a future world devastated by disease, a convict is sent back in time to gather information about the man-made virus that wiped out most of the human population on the planet.

29.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
29.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

41.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

2.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
2.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

22.movie_plot: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

12.movie_plot: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

45.movie_plot: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

26.movie_name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb (1963)
26.movie_plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

18.movie_plot: There is panic throughout the nation as the dead suddenly come back to life. The film follows a group of characters who barricade themselves in an old farmhouse in an attempt to remain safe from these bloodthirsty, flesh-eating monsters.

25.movie_plot: Fearing that the actions of Superman are left unchecked, Batman takes on the Man of Steel, while the world wrestles with what kind of a hero it really needs.

34.movie_plot: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

30.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
30.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

3.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
3.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

32.movie_plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.

28.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
28.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

0.movie_plot: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

44.movie_plot: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time travelling dwarves, as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

31.movie_plot: A ship sent to investigate a wave of mysterious sinkings encounters the advanced submarine, the Nautilus, commanded by Captain Nemo.

37.movie_plot: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

9.movie_plot: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

38.movie_plot: 57 years later, Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team during her hypersleep. The moon from the original movie has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

13.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

1.movie_plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.

6.movie_name: Close Encounters of the Third Kind (1977)
6.movie_plot: After an accidental encounter with otherworldly vessels, an ordinary man follows a series of psychic clues to the first scheduled meeting between representatives of Earth and visitors from the cosmos.

33.movie_plot: When love drive you Mad 2 the Max...

19.movie_plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.

16.movie_plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

47.movie_plot: Humans in a fascistic, militaristic future do battle with giant alien bugs in a fight for survival.

5.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
5.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

14.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

43.movie_plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

27.movie_plot: Captain Picard, with the help of long presumed dead Captain Kirk, must stop a renegade scientist willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter an energy ribbon.

15.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

8.movie_plot: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

42.movie_plot: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives rise to a super-intelligent chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

21.movie_plot: In order to foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a facial transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a terrorist, but the plan turns from bad to worse when the same terrorist impersonates the FBI agent.

35.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

10.movie_name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country (1991)
10.movie_plot: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

7.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

24.movie_plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.

48.movie_plot: Grossly overweight yet good-hearted professor Sherman Klump takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

40.movie_name: Back to the Future Part II (1989)
40.movie_plot: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985...without interfering with his first trip.

11.movie_plot: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

46.movie_plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's corrupted creation and a unique ally who was born inside the digital world.

17.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

39.movie_plot: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

36.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.
